title: Love, Sex & Fashion
overview: Company nurse, Jennifer (Kat Dior), inherits 49% of a fashion business filled with sexy lingerie models, comedy hijinks, and smoldering hot sex where everyone, incluidng the pool guy gets laid. With the company struggling, Lavendar (Misty Stone), steps up to design a new fashion line and end up seducing Jennifer's Boyfriend (Charles Dera) in a wild romp. With tensions rising, the real intrigue surrounds the mysterious heiress to the other 51% of the company. Once Madi Meadows arrives the mystery is solved. But will Madi and Jennifer get together and find a way to come together?
